topics.body:
Random thought time:
I know you guys don't want to hear about the drama shit going on, but it's more about geek culture than anything.

The 90's moral panic about geeks are returning.

For those of you that weren't born yet or were too young to remember the moral panic of the 90's it was essentially:
Jack Thompson and "geeks are violent".
Now the 90's moral panic is back with "geeks are misogynists".


The reason why I think it's a good thing is that back then geek culture was united against the "moral guardians"; if anything the 90's moral panic helped propel geek culture into the mainstream.  Think about how popular video games, anime, manga, my little pony, DnD, Science Fiction, larping, Fantasy and all of geek culture is nowadays.  If the 90's moral panic is what helped propel geek culture into the mainstream imagine what another moral panic will do?  Basically what I'm getting at is if there is another 90's moral panic geek culture will take control of usa culture.

Also side note: I remember the 90's moral panic about geek culture pretty damn well; I actually enjoyed the unity geeks felt about the news media threat cause there was next to no inter-fandom drama; all the different fandoms were united against the "moral guardians" cause they all felt that defending themselves against the greater threat was more important.

Tl:dr; if 24/7 usa news tries to create another moral panic about geek culture then chances are that'll only cause geek culture to take control of mainstream culture in the usa.

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bef5826368722cd5570500#post_54bef5826368722cd5570500
I think I've figured it out though.
I think it does the same thing that games like Alan Wake and The Last of Us do. Where it just loads a bunch of shit into your HDD to avoid heavy load times during the game. As sucky as it may be, I'd prefer one SUPER LONG install at the start than a bunch overly long load times that break up gameplay and story.

I've gotten it down to 4 enemies necessary to kill in order to not die

Grunt manning a plasma gun, a grunt and Jackal combo right after being chased by Elites, and an Elite on a bridge right before the forklift gate

topics.body:
Some guy on Youtube has started hate towards Muslims, Middle East and keep chanting USA in his comment.
He has over 80 replies made my himself and maybe two other people arguing against him.
I myself got involved by 3 replies and my recent reply got his attention.

I said how not only USA is suffering but many other countries suffer more. I made it sound sympathetic by saying how people lost their families, their homes and their right.
He said "Those countries need to learn to wipe their own asses, NOTHING justifies 9/11! NOTHING!!!!!"

(Those were his words exactly.)
